name: Demons Inc: Backoffice
description:
You've just got hired on to work on the back office team at Demons Inc. It's not glamorous, but maybe you can make a name for yourself fulfilling requests for the curses department! 

As you go through your shift, it will ramp up,  so be prepared!

Controls:
Mouse Input Only

Made for Godot Wild Jam 54!

Credits:

Game Design and Programming: Lucas Evans 
Art and Graphic Design: Fiona MacKinnon 
Music and Sound: Alex Evans
